title: 2022 Week 1 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
itunes:title: 2022 Week 1 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal bring you the first preview show of the 2022 season! To start, we make an announcement about the LIVE show in London coming up in September (2:34). Then, we look ahead to the Week 1 action across the NFL, starting with the Sunday night matchup between the Buccaneers and Cowboys (7:00), followed by Monday Night Football with the Broncos taking on the Seahawks (15:12). After the break, we get into our draft previewing every game on the Sunday slate (22:45) beginning with the most highly anticipated contest of the day, Raiders at Chargers (26:00). Everyone locks up a pick for the lock competition, the guys talk Baker Mayfield's revenge game against the Browns (1:21:50), and we cover the importance of the Bengals making a statement against the Steelers (1:27:50). Finally, we wrap things up with a very special guest stopping by the studio (1:38:40).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
